title: Dr. Atkins' Age-Defying Diet Revolution
description: The nation's most famous diet doctor turns his eye to the aging process, offering readers diet advice on preventing cardiovascular disease, reducing the risk of cancer, avoiding the onset of diabetes, and preserving brain function, among other benefits. 250,000 first printing. $500,000 ad/promo. Lit Guild & Doubleday.
author: Robert C. Atkins
